original_title: El corazón es la cuarta pared
overview: A pair of ex-lovers argues in bed about their past relationship. They reminisce as each image from their memory comes alive as if it was happening right there. A conversation, banal in its nature, with hints of a video-essay and meta-cinema, ends up exploring the different ways in which we can recall love.

production_companies.name: Escuela Profesional de Cine de Eliseo Subiela

title: El corazón es la cuarta pared
